name: Running paper
description:
Running paper is an endless runner featuring a newspaper aesthetic, and a yoloish gameplay!

Gameplay :
Avoid obstacles, destroy some boxes, and punch ennemies out of your way to beat your highscore!

Controls :
Click play to start
Press [Space] or [↑] to jump
Press [c] or [↓] to dive during a jump
Press [x] or  [→] to punch walls or ennemies
The roofs are not the only places you can go, don't hesitate to yolo yourself inside some buildings.

Credits :
Alexandre Berard - Game design
Taylan Kahraman - Game art
Morigan Letourneau  - Programming
Wilhelm Thomaseau - Programming
